text: Us roz munafik mardon aur auraton ka haal yeh hoga ke woh momino se kahenge zara hamari taraf dekho taa-ke hum tumhare noor se kuch fayda uthayein. Magar unse kaha jayega pichey hatt jao, Apna noor kahin aur talash karo. Phir unke darmiyan ek deewar hayal kardi jayegi jismein ek darwaza hoga us darwaze ke andar rehmat hogi aur bahar azaab
